name: Blade of Alpha
customPrimary: Fire %s extra projectiles with %s HE DPH instead of fire a beam when "Limiter Shiftdown" was actived. The projectiles can piece armor and hull, dealing DPS that euqals %s of its DPH, they can be stopped only by hitting on a shield frontally.
